query.name: add_on_deal_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an add on deal activity.

query.name: start_time
query.description: The time when bundle deal activity start.The start time must be 1 hour than current time.

query.name: end_time
query.description: The time when bundle deal activity end. The end time must be later than start time.

query.name: purchase_min_spend
query.description: The minimum purchase amount that needs to be met to buy the gift with min.Spend

query.name: per_gift_num
query.description: Number of gifts that buyers can get

query.name: promotion_purchase_limit
query.description: Max. number of add-on products that a customer can purchase per order.

query.name: add_on_deal_name
query.description: Title of the add on deal

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

schema.name: start_time
schema.description: The time when add on deal activity start.

schema.name: end_time
schema.description: The time when add on deal activity end

schema.name: promotion_type
schema.description: The type of add on deal：add on discount =0；gift with mini spend=1

schema.name: purchase_min_spend
schema.description: The minimum purchase amount that needs to be met to buy the gift with min.Spend

schema.name: add_on_deal_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an add on deal activity.

schema.name: per_gift_num
schema.description: Number of gifts that buyers can get

schema.name: promotion_purchase_limit
schema.description: Max. number of add-on products that a customer can purchase per order.

schema.name: add_on_deal_name
schema.description: Title of the add on deal

error_codes.message: The add on deal created by admin can't be edited
At least one sub item should be added in add on deal
The purchase min spend and per gift num is not needed in add on discount
The purchase limit is not needed in gift with mini.spend
The start time of upcoming add on deal can't be shorted
Promotion end time can only be changed to an earlier timing.
The promotion period can't exceed 6 months
The end time should be 1 hour later than start time
The expired add on deal can't be edited
Only upcoming add on deal can be deleted
The name of add on deal can't exceed 25 characters
The add on deal not existed
The {value} of ongoing add on deal can't be edited
Please input page number between 1-1000
Please input page type between 1-100
Please input per gift number between 1 to 50
Please input correct promotion purchase limit
Please input correct promotion status:all: 0, ongoing: 1, upcoming: 2, expired: 3
Please input purchase min spend
Please enter a discount price less than the original price
Please input add on deal purchase limit between 1 to 100
Please input correct priority
This product is under a category that is prohibited from promotions due to regulations in your country
higher tier should have higher discount per item (discount per item = discount value off / item amount)
Wrong rule value
The promotion period can't exceed 6 months
End time cannot exceed 6 months after start time
There is no access_token in query.
Invalid access_token.
Invalid partner_id.
There is no partner_id in query.
No permission to current api.
There is no sign in query.
Wrong sign.
no timestamp
Invalid timestamp
Inner http call failed
You can only add up to 1000 products
